original_text: And all the firstborn in the land of Egypt shall die, from the first born of Pharaoh that sitteth upon his throne, even unto the firstborn of the maidservant that is behind the mill; and all the firstborn of beasts.
korean_text: 애굽 땅에 있는 모든 처음 난 것은 왕위에 앉아 있는 바로의 장자로부터 맷돌 뒤에 있는 몸종의 장자와 모든 가축의 처음 난 것까지 죽으리니

sentences.original_text: And all the firstborn in the land of Egypt shall die
sentences.korean_translation: 이집트 땅의 모든 장자는 죽을 것이라

sentences.original_text: from the first born of Pharaoh
even unto the firstborn of the maidservant
and all the firstborn of beasts
